net.hudup.core.alg

Class ModelBasedRecommenderAbstract

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.hudup.core.alg.AlgAbstract
      • net.hudup.core.alg.RecommenderAbstract
        • net.hudup.core.alg.ModelBasedRecommenderAbstract
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote, java.util.EventListener, Alg, AlgRemote, AlgRemoteTask, ModelBasedAlg, ModelBasedAlgRemote, ModelBasedAlgRemoteTask, ModelBasedRecommender, Recommender, RecommenderRemote, RecommenderRemoteTask, SetupAlgListener, Exportable, Inspectable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ModelBasedCFAbstract

    public abstract class ModelBasedRecommenderAbstract
extends RecommenderAbstract
implements ModelBasedRecommender, ModelBasedAlgRemote
    This class implements basically the model-based recommendation algorithm represented by the interface ModelBasedRecomender.
    Version:
    10.0
    Author:
    Loc Nguyen
    See Also:

    • Field Detail

      • kb

        protected KBase kb
        The internal KBase of this model-based recommender. For example, if model-based recommender uses frequent pattern to make recommendation, the internal KBase contains such pattern.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ModelBasedRecommenderAbstract

        public ModelBasedRecommenderAbstract()
        Default constructor, which always call ModelBasedAlgRemoteTask.newKB() to create knowledge base.

      • setup

        public void setup(Dataset dataset,
                  java.lang.Object... params)
           throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Description copied from interface: RecommenderRemoteTask
        Setting up this recommender based on specified dataset and additional parameters
        Specified by:
        setup in interface RecommenderRemoteTask
        Parameters:
        dataset - dataset is the main parameter to setup this recommender.
        params - Additional parameters to set up this recommender. This parameter is really an array of sub-parameters. Its elements should be serializable for RMI.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if any error occurs.

      • unsetup

        public void unsetup()
             throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Description copied from interface: RecommenderRemoteTask
        Unset this recommender. After this method is called, this recommender cannot be used unless the method RecommenderRemoteTask.setup(Dataset, Object...) is called again.

               throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Description copied from interface: ModelBasedAlgRemoteTask

      • createKBase

        public KBase createKBase(Dataset dataset)
                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Description copied from interface: ModelBasedAlgRemoteTask
        Creating a new knowledge base represented by KBase interface from specified dataset. For example, if model-based recommender uses frequent purchase pattern to make recommendation, the new KBase contains such pattern.
        Specified by:
        createKBase in interface ModelBasedAlgRemoteTask
        Parameters:
        dataset - specified dataset.
        Returns:
        new instance of KBase.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if any error raises.

      • getDataset

        public Dataset getDataset()
                   throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Description copied from interface: Recommender
        Any recommender has always a reference to a dataset represented by Dataset class because recommender is executed on the dataset. Some recommender (s) store internal dataset but others only have references to dataset. Anyway, such reference always exists.
        Specified by:
        getDataset in interface Recommender
        Returns:
        reference to dataset.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if any error raises.
